Title: Hai Apna Dil Toh Awara
Actors: Sahil Anand, Niyati Joshi, Vikram Kochhar, Divya Choksey
Plot: Hai Apna Dil Toh Awara is a slice of life in the lives of three couples who have their own point of views about life and when their thoughts collide, it's a Bull vs Matador fight to the finish for them.
